name: Libertas Capital
tag_list: vc, venture-capital, ipo, bank, finance, investment-bank, seies-a, series-b
overview:
Libertas Capital is an international financial services firm offering its clients a full range of dedicated independent Investment Banking Advisory, Research, and Distribution services.

Our global investment banking team comprises finance professionals with substantial depth in M&A, venture capital, structured finance including convertible securities, public equity and private equity experience.

Our business is based on core values and strengths which we believe both differentiate Libertas Capital from its competitors and give us a competitive advantage. We aim to provide a high level of customer service that will result in long-term client relationships based on the principles of openness, innovation and creativity.
